email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The MV Ocean Star sounds like a good fit, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you come down to $49.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $49.75 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The laycan is October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $49.75 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with the laycan of October 15-20. Could you also confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the rate works for you. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage rate is acceptable. Please go ahead and send the charter party agreement. We’ll review it and get back to you shortly. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve just sent over the charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarifications. Looking forward to finalizing this deal. Best, Sarah
